title: Packaging templates
content:
Would anyone know the best sites to obtain free templates for packaging or standard size fr brochures, envelopes... etc.

thanks
author: wandar

comments.content:
Wandar:

There are some great books out there, one of them being:  
The Packaging Designer’s Book of Patterns  
by Lazlo Roth

Take a look at [www.designerstoolbox.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20090417174915/http:/www.designerstoolbox.com/ "www.designerstoolbox.com").  
I’m sure you’ll find something there.
